Posts.Content: May 26, 2010 11:36AM amIdoneyet wrote: Hi all!  New to this forum  32 yo mom of 2 (ages 8 and soon to be 4!)  TN, BRCA -. I began chemo 11/09 and had last infusion 4/5/10.  Just 2 weeks out from lump +AND (5/12) and supposed to start rads in June.  I did 4 cycles of gemzar, taxotere, and avastin followed by 4 cycles of AC (first 2 with avastin) through a clinical trial.  Well, after surgery the clinical trial calls for 10 additional doses of avastin.  Has anyone had avastin as a single agent? And if so, how were the SE's if any? My Med Onc says that it is a "breeze and easy" compared to the combo chemo I previously had.
Posts.Title: November 2009-Starting Chemo BrendaSharon livelife
